Posts.Content: Hi Debbie D, I am going through a reccurrence of breast cancer that has spread to the bone. I have been in treatment since March 2004. I take Zometa and Femara. But, I am starting to get worried my Tumor mark has spiked up to 85 from a 67. I would like to know how you would handled this situation. Thanks in Advance ladysoldier
Posts.Title: Reoccuring Breast Cancer
